title: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls (2 Packs of 6), Equivalent to 38 Regular Rolls, White
descriptions:
**Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels, 158 Sheet Huge Roll, 12 Rolls**

**About This Product**

Experience the ultimate in paper towel convenience and absorbency with Amazon Brand's Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels. Each roll contains 158 sheets of 2-ply absorbency, perfect for tackling spills and messes in the kitchen, bathroom, or anywhere else.

**Key Features**

* **Convenient Size Options**: With the unique Flex-a-Size feature, you can choose the perfect sheet size for any task, from small messes to big spills.
* **Superior Absorbency**: Our paper towels are up to 75% more absorbent than leading 1-ply brands, so you can clean up with confidence.
* **Long-Lasting Rolls**: Each Huge Roll contains 158 sheets, equivalent to 38 regular rolls.
* **Value Pack**: This 12-roll pack includes two 6-roll packs, perfect for stocking up or sharing with friends and family.

**Product Details**

* Product Name: Amazon Brand - Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels
* Quantity: 12 rolls
* Roll Count per Pack: 2 packs of 6 rolls each
* Sheet Count per Roll: 158 sheets
* Ply: 2-ply
* Absorbency: Up to 75% more absorbent than leading 1-ply brands
* Flex-a-Size: Yes, choose the perfect sheet size for any task
* Color: White
* Brand: Presto!
* Comparison Brand: Bounty Paper Towels

**Why Choose Amazon Brand's Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels?**

* Convenience: With the Flex-a-Size feature, you can customize your sheet size to fit any mess.
* Absorbency: Our paper towels are designed to tackle tough spills and messes with ease.
* Value: This 12-roll pack is perfect for stocking up or sharing with friends and family.

**Order Now and Experience the Power of Presto! Flex-a-Size Paper Towels**

Click the "Add to Cart" button to get started.
